title: Leadership-Based OER Utilization Workshop for Elementary Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary math basics and fundamental digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Roles include corporate training managers/developers responsible for in-house programs. Requires cultivating the ability to design math education projects using OER in smartphone-limited tech environments.

learning_goals: Within four weeks, learners can select three or more educational resources suitable for elementary mathematics topics through OER search/evaluation
Learners can design and present OER-based mathematics project proposals through collaboration with team members applying the leadership advocacy model
Learners can concretely develop mathematics teaching-learning activity scenarios utilizing OER in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
